thread.title: Apple sale: iPhone devices as low as Rs 17,999
thread.title_full: Apple sale: iPhone devices as low as Rs 17,999

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: Apple sale: iPhone devices as low as Rs 17,999
text:
Apple iPhone 7 Cupertino tech-giant Apple has managed to establish a niche market for itself. Each year, the company comes up with a new addition to its iPhone flagship family at an amount that is — more times than often — pretty unaffordable by many.
However, thanks to the numerous Apple sales — the prices of these smartphones end up reducing considerably.
So if you’re interested in buying an iPhone device in India right now, take a look at the following given list of iPhone devices and their current market rate:
iPhone 7 (Rs 54,999)
The 4.7-inch iPhone 7 was launched late last year. The smartphone comes equipped with 3D touch quad-core A10 fusion 64-bit processor with six-core GPU, M10 motion co-processor, 2GB of RAM, 32/128/256GB of internal storage and a 1960mAh built-in battery.
iPhone 7 Plus (Rs 66,500)
The iPhone 7 Plus comes packed with a 5.5-inch IPS display, 3D touch quad-core A10 Fusion 64-bit processor, 3GB RAM, 32/128/256GB of internal storage. The device is powered by a 2,900mAh battery built-in battery.
iPhone 6S (Rs 42,500)
The iPhone 6S smartphone features a 4.7-inch retina HD display with 3D touch A9 chip. The smartphone features a 12MP iSight camera and a 5MP front facing camera. The device is powered by a 1715mAh battery.
iPhone 6S Plus (Rs 46,000)
The iPhone 6S Plus packs a 5.5-inch retina HD display along with a 3D touch A9 chip. The smartphone features a 12MP iSight rear camera along with a 5MP front-facing camera.
iPhone 6 (Rs 27,990)
The iPhone 6 features a 4.7-inch retina HD display along with an A8 chip with 64-bit architecture. The device sports an 8MP iSight rear camera along with a 1.2MP front-facing camera with Touch ID.
iPhone 5S (Rs 17,999)
The iPhone 5S features a 4-inch retina display with Nano SIM A7 processor. The device packs an 8MP rear camera with dual-LED flash.
iPhone 4S (Rs 12,200)
The iPhone 4S sports a 4-inch retina display with Nano SIM A7 processor. The device packs an 8MP rear camera with dual-LED flash. The smartphone comes equipped with a Li-Po 1420mAh battery.
iPhone SE (Rs 28,989)
The iPhone SE sports a 4-inch retina HD display with 3D touch A9 chip and 64-bit architecture. The device sports a 12MP iSight rear camera alogn with a 1.2MP front-facing camera. The smartphone is packed with a built-in re-chargeable lithium-ion battery.
